descriptionHtml:
v1.1
Remove the change to the Ring of the Erudite.
It increases magicka regeneration in a special way so the change in v1.0 is not appropriate.


=Required=
(1) Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8
(2) Dawnguard
(3) Dragonborn


=What did I do=
(1) Change the enchantment charge or cost (or both) of some unique weapon.
(2) Change the enchantment effect of some unique items.
(3) Add new enantments for some unique items.
(4) Change the discription of some unique items.



=List of Items being modded==
=================
***[Artifacts]***
=================
-Auriel's Bow-
Enchantment cost 0

-Dawnbreaker-
Enchantment cost 0

-Harkon's Sword-
Charge/Cost = Uses --> from 3000/128=23 to 3000/50=60

-The Rueful Axe-
Does 30 points of Stamina damage
Does 30 points of Magicka damage

-Archmage's Robe (hooded and hoodless)-
All spells cost 25% less to cast, +100 magicka, and magicka regenerates 100% faster.

-Ebony Mail-
You are able to move more quietly, and opponents that get too close take 10 points poison damage per second.

-The Gauldur Amulet (and Fragments)-
Increases your Health, Magicka, and Stamina by 50 points.

-Masque of Clavicus Vile-
Prices are 25% better. Speech increased by 20 points. Magicka regenerates 100% faster.

-Necromancer Amulet-
+100 magicka, Conjuration spells cost 25% less to cast, Health and Stamina regen 75% slower.

-Savior's Hide-
Increases Magic Resistance by 25%. Increases Poison Resistance by 100%.

-Shield of Ysgramor-
Increases Magic Resistance by 25%. Increases Health by 25 Points. Block 25% more damage with your shield.

-Targe of the Blooded-
When bashing, does 5 points of bleeding damage for 7 seconds.

-Miraak's Boots / Miraak's Gloves-
Adds 10% to the dragon breath and spell absorption of Miraak's Robes



===========================

===========================
-Hevnoraak-
Immune to disease and poison. Increases Magic Resistance by 25%.

-Krosis-
Lockpicking, Archery, and Alchemy are 30% better.

-Morokei-
Magicka regenerates 200% faster. Time between shouts is reduced 20%.

-Nahkriin-
+100 Magicka, and Destruction and Restoration spells cost 25% less.

-Rahgot-
Increases your stamina by 70 points. One-handed and Two-Handed attacks do 30% more damage.

-Vokun-
Conjuration, Illusion and Alteration spells cost 25% less magicka to cast. Sneaking is 25% better.

-Volsung-
Prices are 25% better, Carry 150 points more, and can breathe underwater.

-Miraak-
Increases your magicka by 100 points. Time between shouts is reduced 50%.
